div.div:
Changing the world is all in a day's work at Apple. If you love innovation, here's your chance to make a career of it. You'll work hard. But the job comes with more than a few perks.
AppleCare Business Insight is a dynamic data science organization that provides insight to improve post sale ownership experience and to drive business impact.
This role is for a full-stack data scientist within AppleCare Business Insight team to provide data driven insight to improve revenue and margin for AppleCares extended warranty products. The employee builds data engineering assets and statistical/machine learning models to surface actionable business insights. The role engages with the business and finance teams to define problem statement, design analytical solution and operationalize the solution. The employee also works with large scale computing frameworks, data analysis systems and modeling environments (e.g., Spark, Hadoop, Cosmos, CloudML, Turi , etc).
Key Qualifications:
2-3 years of directly related experience required
Excellent statistical, machine learning and data mining skills
Superior data modeling and analysis in R/Python
Experience in data engineering using SQL, Tableau
A strong quantitative academic background
Ability to network broadly across the organization and drive collaboration
Knowledge of regression, time series analysis, clustering, decision tree techniques
Proven oral and written communication skills
Experience in providing analytics support for insurance business is a plus
Description:
Responsibilities include:
Build data engineering assets using Teradata SQL
Develop interactive, self-service Tableau dashboards
Program in Python/R to develop predictive and forecasting models
Device advanced statistical/machine learning methods to improve current KPIs
Operationalize the data engineering and machine learning models
Education:
BA/BS in a quantitative field (Statistics, Computer Science, Ops Research etc.)
Masters or PhD in Statistics is a plus
Apple is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants, including minorities, women, protected veterans, and individuals with disabilities.
